title: Archive through July 02, 2002
content:
I work on a movie project and I have to produce clean subtitles/captions for it.   
So does someone know which typefaces are the most used for subtitling? Which sizes work best? What do I have to know?   
Thank you.   
   
I have already found these resources:   
.ITC [Tabula](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010235941/http:/www.itcfonts.com/fonts/detail.asp?sku=ITC9194) was originally conceived to be used in film subtitling.   
.A useful article by Joe Clark ["Comments on U.K.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010235941/http:/www.joeclark.org/uksubs.html)
author: gregorycadars
